sqlMap.select: SELECT post.postscriptno, post.id, post.content, post.regdate, post.postgrade FROM sol_postscript post join sol_category category ON post.categoryno = category.categoryno WHERE category.grade = #grade# AND category.gwamok = #gwamok# ORDER BY post.postscriptno DESC
SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM sol_postscript post join sol_category category ON post.categoryno = category.categoryno WHERE category.grade = #grade# AND category.gwamok = #gwamok#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO sol_postscript(postscriptno, categoryno, id, content, regdate) VALUES (#postscriptno#, #categoryno#, #id#, #content#, now())
sqlMap.select: SELECT max(categoryno) FROM sol_category WHERE grade=#grade# AND gwamok=#gwamok#
SELECT grade, gwamok from sol_category WHERE categoryno=#categoryno#
